definition: to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

sentences.english: As soon as you prove to be good, you will get more followers.
sentences.chinese: 如果事實證明你還不錯，必定會有更多追隨者。

sentences.english: Open and attentive followthrough is necessary to resolve issues.
sentences.chinese: 公開和專心的追隨對解決問題是必須的。

sentences.english: That' s after a US-Iraqi crackdown against his followers continues.
sentences.chinese: 那之後，美國和伊拉克打擊他的追隨者仍在繼續。

sentences.english: But what he's doing is so easy to follow.
sentences.chinese: 但是他所做的是很容易被接受追隨的。

sentences.english: I'm largely a follower of a plant-based diet, of course.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我也是植物性飲食的熱心追隨者。

sentences.english: I hope Your Most Reverend will take the lead and we shall do our best to follow in this work.
sentences.chinese: 希望大主教能帶頭領導，我們將盡心盡力追隨。

sentences.english: In the wake of the scandal, the senator's one-time adherents quietly deserted him.
sentences.chinese: 因爲醜聞，該參議院昔日的追隨者悄然棄他而去。

sentences.english: His followers adopted the custom of wearing a Shamrock on his feast day.
sentences.chinese: 他的追隨者在他的宗教節日採取了佩帶三葉草風俗。

sentences.english: His followers adopted the custom of wearing a shamrock on his feast day .
sentences.chinese: 因此，他的追隨者在節日當天都佩帶三葉草。

sentences.english: But someone else's way of looking at things – Barthelme's, for instance – should not be chased after by other writers.
sentences.chinese: 一味地追隨和模仿他人對事物的觀察方法是徒勞的。

sentences.english: He himself could never forget the three years he had spent in the earthly presence of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 對他來說，追隨基督的那三年光陰，是他永志難忘的。

sentences.english: The eye tends to follow these lines to the point where they converge.
sentences.chinese: 人們的目光一直追隨着這些線條直到會聚點。

sentences.english: Living by faith continues with a decision to follow Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 憑信而活還要有追隨耶穌的決定。

sentences.english: She and a small group of her followers pursued Illidan through the portal.
sentences.chinese: 她和一小部分追隨者追蹤伊利丹越過了傳送門。

sentences.english: The princess followed it with her eyes, but soon it disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 公主的眼光追隨着它，不久它就消失了。

sentences.english: To follow knowledge like a sinking star.
sentences.chinese: 去追隨知識，像那西沉的星星。

definition: to make a supreme effort/at all costs
to hold fast to/to stick to
to see with one's own eyes/very soon
to hug/to cherish/within the bosom (of the family)/to embrace (also fig. an ideal, aspiration etc)
